titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A proclamation for maintenaunce of tillage
Proclamations. 1569-03-01
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation that arable land should not be converted to pasture.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Last indented line to the right of initial begins: "tutes".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
